name: Capture rr recording with 30s timeout
notes: Run: timeout 30 rr record --chaos build/valk test/test_debug_handler.valk 2>&1 | tail -50. The test hangs at SSE reconnect so 30s is enough to capture it. After timeout, check rr ls to confirm recording exists. Do NOT replay or analyze - just capture.
accept: rr ls shows a recording for valk/test_debug_handler

desc: rr (time-travel debugger) is not installed on this system. Cannot capture rr recordings for flaky test debugging. Need to either install rr or use alternative debugging approaches (core dumps, TSAN).
